𒈣𒃶 Magan & Meluhha (𒈨𒈛𒄩)

𒃶 KÁM ≈ 𓆎 Khem in 𒈣𒃶 Magan Makkan Mekkan "Egypt, Arabia, Oman" O'Mağn

Magan : Margiana?
Magan : merchants from the southern seas
Magan : oman (ƒ?) jeman amun ⇔ dilmun 𒉌𒌇𒆠
Magan : Mizraim = Egypt
Merkan : 𓇿 𓌻 𓂋 𓏮 𓇜 𓊖 Tamerika = Egypt

≠ Mergar = Marhashi (?) Margiana? 𒈥𒄩𒅆𒆠 Parhasi Persia!
